name: MD SUMON
descripton: The screen didn’t even work or turn on—-it was black the whole time. My seven years old Dell laptop performs better than this. What a waste of time and money. It’s clear that the HP team don’t double check their products or give much care to their products.

descripton: Nice looking laptop. When I got it it was extremely slow!!! I restarted and updated and now it’s great.

name: MD SUZIT
descripton: How can they call this a computer?? It’s so slow it’s totally unusable. The hard drive isn’t even big enough for Windows. Don’t buy this “computer.” I returned it after two hours. Buyer beware. Full stop.

name: MD DIPOK
descripton: I bought this to run silhouette studio. It will not run without continually locking up or going SUPER slow :
